title: Understanding Future Simple Tense
objectives: Understand Future Simple at Beginner level
Apply Future Simple in real conversations

vocabulary.definition: In a short time from now

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Future Simple.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Future Simple at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Future Simple daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: I will go to the store tomorrow.
I go to the store tomorrow.
I am going to the store tomorrow.

exercises.question: Describe what you will do this weekend.

culturalNote: Future Simple is widely used in American culture for promises, plans, and predictions, especially in everyday conversations and media.
